تشطيب الفيلا سوبر ديلوكس واجهه حجر يوجد ضمان علي الفيلا 25سنه السعر المطلوب مليون و250 الف درهم قابل للتفاوض مباشر من المالك الفيلا بصك ملكيه ومخطط من بلديه عجمان  
متوفر كافة الخدمات من ماء وكهرباء وصرف قريب من المسجد

title_advert: ['Exclusive large beach front plot priced  to  sell']
amenities:
['Private Garden
Private Pool
Security
View of Landmark']
descriptions: ["DescriptionThis plot has full sea view, private beach and is handed over, ready to build. Located north of Dubai's beachfront shoreline of Jumeirah, this exclusive island houses 127 villa plots and is home to the first Bulgari Resort and Residences in the Middle East. This purpose-built island, developed by Meraas, will soon be home to Dubai's most discerning residents, with the luxury of uninterrupted views to the Arabian Gulf. Residents on the Jumeirah Bay Island enjoy their own private beach. Spread over 6.3 million square feet, the Jumeirah Bay Island has direct access to Jumeirah Beach Road via a 300m  private bridge next to The Four Seasons Hotel.\nThis plot offers the choicest of views towards the open sea of the Arabian Gulf, the skyline of Dubai as well as spectacular views of the Burj Khalifa. Get in touch now to book your property, choose from a selection of plots to suit your size and space needs.\nThis pristine site is one of the most sought after locations in Dubai and could be yours."]

descriptions: ['DescriptionA large plot for sale on Jumeirah Bay Island with open sea views of the Gulf and the Downtown Dubai skyline.\nSituated off the coast of Jumeirah, behind the new Four Season’s hotel, Jumeirah Bay Island  is set to become the most sought after address in Dubai with luxurious residences and breath-taking sea views. With the iconic Bulgari Resort & Residences nearing completion which will include a 5-star hotel,  villas, apartments, a yacht club, a marina, and an array of leisure facilities, Jumeirah Bay is soon to be a luxurious destination. \nThe 17,222 sq ft plot for sale is one of only 128 land plots on the island and enjoys a prime location with private beach access and stunning ocean and skyline views. Residents and visitors have access to the island through a bridge off the vibrant Jumeirah Beach Road. Contact our team for any for viewings of the plot.']

Al Raha Lofts One and two stands six stories tall, consisting of mostly residential properties with over 280 apartments, including studios, one, two and three-bedroom properties.
